funFacts: The raccoon can fit in your ass.
Your snot fly at a speed of ~44 km/h when you sneeze.
The United States has no official language.
A cockroach can live for several weeks without a head. It will eventually starve to death.
Galileo's middle finger is stored in the Science Museum in Florence.
The Spanish word „esposas” means both „handcuffs” and „wifes”.
There are about 4 „billiards of billiards” bacteria on Earth.
Oceans contain nearly 200,000 different types of viruses.
There are about 2,000 storms happening on Earth at any given moment.
Over a million planets of the Earth would fit into one sun.
Eel-flavored ice creams are available in Japan.
The world's largest pumpkin weighted more than a car.
There are more liquor stores in **Bydgoszcz** than in the rest of Norway.

answers: I dont know, ask someone else
